```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load in packages

```{r load in tidyverse, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

Create a vectors with .mul and .evt names

```{r file names}
# vector of all files in working directory partitioned by avg montage and evt files
files_mast <- list.files(here("data", "mast_export"))
files_avg <- list.files(here("data", "avr_export"))
files_evt <- list.files(here("data", "mast_evt"))
# remove 206201831 and 206201831b, as these files will have to be handled separately
rem_case <- function(string) {
string[-(str_which(string, "206201831"))]
}
split_case_mast <- str_subset(files_mast, "206201831")
split_case_avr <- str_subset(files_avg, "206201831")
split_case_evt <- str_subset(files_evt, "206201831")

lst <- map(list(files_mast,
           files_avg, 
           files_evt), ~ rem_case(.x))
# assign new character vectors back to variables
files_mast <- lst[[1]]
files_avg <- lst[[2]]
files_evt <- lst[[3]]
```
Read in .mul and .evt files
```{r read in .evt files, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
#preallocate space
mastoid <- as_tibble(matrix(data = NA_real_, nrow = 580454, ncol = 80))
avr <- as_tibble(matrix(data = NA_real_, nrow = 580454, ncol = 69))
evt_avr <- tibble(
  Tmu = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  block = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  n_trials = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  pid = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  prop_trials = rep(NA, times = 51*7)
)
mast_avr <- tibble(
  Tmu = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  block = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  n_trials = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  pid = rep(NA, times = 51*7),
  prop_trials = rep(NA, times = 51*7)
)

# make list of block names
block_names <- c("Pos_Inc",
                 "Pos_Dec",
                 "Pos_Watch",
                 "Neg_Inc",
                 "Neg_Dec",
                 "Neg_Watch",
                 "Neu_Watch")

# read in evt files, make columns for block, number of trials, and pid. This cleans names up, too.
evt <- map_df(files_evt, ~{
  read_table(here("data", "mast_evt", .x)) %>% 
  separate(`Code	TriNo	Comnt`, into = c("block", "n_trials"), sep = " ") %>% 
  mutate(block = str_extract(block, block_names),
         n_trials = as.numeric(str_extract(n_trials, "[0-9]{2}")),
         pid = as.numeric(str_extract(.x, "[0-9]+")),
         prop_trials = n_trials / 40)
})

# this reads all mastoid-referenced files into a list and generates pid, block, and ms variables
mastoid <- map_df(here("data", "mast_export", files_mast), ~ {
  read_table2(.x, skip = 1) %>%
  mutate(
    pid = as.numeric(str_extract(.x, "[0-9]{7,}")),
    block = rep(block_names, each = nrow(.) / 7),
    ms = rep(seq(from = -200, to = 3000, 
                   by = ((3200 + (3200 / (nrow(.)/7))) / (nrow(.)/7))),
               times = 7),
    )
  }
  )
# drop extraneous columns
mastoid <- mastoid %>% select(-c(E67:X74, X71:X72))
# this reads all average-referenced files into a list and generates, pid, block, and ms variables
avg <- map_df(here("data", "avr_export", files_avg), ~ {
  read_table2(.x, skip = 1) %>%
  mutate(
    pid = as.numeric(str_extract(.x, "[0-9]{7,}")),
    block = rep(block_names, each = nrow(.) / 7),
    ms = rep(seq(from = -200, to = 3000, 
                   by = ((3200 + (3200 / (nrow(.)/7))) / (nrow(.)/7))),
               times = 7))
  }
  )
```

```{r clean up variable/condition names}
# clean up electrode names
names(avg) <- gsub("_.*", "", names(avg))
names(mastoid) <- gsub("_.*", "", names(mastoid))
```

Merge split case with rest of the data

```{r take care of split case}
# mastoid reference
split_case_mr <- bind_rows(read_table2(here("data", "mast_export", split_case_mast[1]), skip = 1), read_table2(here("data", "mast_export", split_case_mast[2]), skip = 1)) %>% 
  mutate(
    pid = as.numeric(str_extract(split_case_mast[1], "[0-9]{7,}")),
    block = rep(block_names, each = nrow(.) / 7),
    ms = rep(seq(from = -200, to = 3000, 
                   by = ((3200 + (3200 / (nrow(.)/7))) / (nrow(.)/7))),
               times = 7)) %>% 
  select(-c(E67:X74))

mastoid <- bind_rows(mastoid, split_case_mr)

# average reference
split_case_ar <- bind_rows(read_table2(here("data", "avr_export", split_case_avr[1]), skip = 1), read_table2(here("data", "avr_export", split_case_avr[2]), skip = 1)) %>% 
  mutate(
    pid = as.numeric(str_extract(split_case_avr[1], "[0-9]{7,}")),
    block = rep(block_names, each = nrow(.) / 7),
    ms = rep(seq(from = -200, to = 3000, 
                   by = ((3200 + (3200 / (nrow(.)/7))) / (nrow(.)/7))),
               times = 7))

avg <- bind_rows(avg, split_case_ar)

# evt data
split_case_evt <- bind_rows(read_table(here("data", "mast_evt", split_case_evt[1])),
          read_table(here("data", "mast_evt", split_case_evt[2]))) %>% 
  separate(`Code	TriNo	Comnt`, into = c("block", "n_trials"), sep = " ") %>% 
  mutate(block = c("Pos_Dec",
                   "Neg_Inc",
                   "Neu_Watch",
                   "Pos_Inc",
                   "Pos_Watch",
                   "Neg_Dec",
                   "Neg_Watch"),
         n_trials = as.numeric(n_trials),
         pid = as.numeric(str_extract(split_case_evt[1], "[0-9]+")),
         prop_trials = n_trials / 40)
evt <- bind_rows(evt, split_case_evt)
```

```{r merge mul and evt dataframes}
# preallocate space
erp_mast <- as_tibble(matrix(data = NA_real_, nrow = nrow(mastoid), ncol = ncol(mastoid) + ncol(evt)))
erp_avr <- as_tibble(matrix(data = NA_real_, nrow = nrow(avg), ncol = ncol(avg) + ncol(evt)))
# merge
erp_mast <- inner_join(mastoid, evt, by = c("pid", "block"))
erp_avr <- inner_join(avg, evt, by = c("pid", "block"))
# fix incorrect pid
erp_mast$pid[erp_mast$pid == 201206832] <- 206201832
erp_avr$pid[erp_avr$pid == 201206832] <- 206201832
# set pid as character class
erp_mast$pid <- as.character(erp_mast$pid)
erp_avr$pid <- as.character(erp_avr$pid)
# write files
write_csv(erp_mast, here("data", "created_data", "erp_mast.csv"))
write_csv(erp_avr, here("data", "created_data", "erp_avr.csv"))
```
